data.persona: My pack is behind me. I am alpha. Now is the wolftime.
data.description:
You are in the Primary Cave.
Dark and with a lot of space in it. The primary cave has a scary look that scares people away. Underneath, in the floor, many precious minerals that no one dares to get out.
There's a weapon and a skull here.
The prince is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a wolf costume.

data.short_motivation: I'm going to steal the weapon from the prince, so he can't kill my pack and I.
data.mid_motivation: The prince's hunting party is in my forest this weekend, and I need to protect my pack until they're gone, or dead.
data.long_motivation: I will protect my pack, so that our pups will grow big enough to protect them selves when we move to a bigger cave.
